title: Sorry, Rihanna! Ed Sheeran changes his mind and keeps song for himself after joking James Blunt was responsible for his sword scar
text:
Sorry, Rihanna! Ed Sheeran changes his mind and keeps song for himself after joking James Blunt was responsible for his sword scar Ed Sheeran tells Radio 1 about Rihanna, his sword scar and Game of Thrones connection Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ed Sheeran reveals who he originally wrote one of his songs for Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! He’s penned hit songs for a string of celebrities over the years but occasionally Ed Sheeran decides to keep one of the tracks for himself. 
Sorry, Rihanna ! 
Speaking on the BBC Radio 1 Breakfast Show, the popstar admitted he wrote new song, Shape Of You, with Rihanna in mind only to do a U-Turn and decide to record it himself. Ed co-hosted Friday's BBC Radio 1 Breakfast Show with Scott Mills, marking his first radio interview in two years (Photo: BBC) 
“This is actually a really random one,” laughed Ed. 
“I went in to write songs for other people, and we were writing this song. I said, ‘This will really work for Rihanna’ then I started singing lyrics like, ‘Putting Van the Man on the jukebox’ and I was like, ‘She’s not really going to sing that, is she?’ 
“We decided halfway through to keep it for me,” he said. 
“This came really late, it was the last song that was finished and I just didn’t put two and two together it would even be on the album at all.” Rihanna was the original recipient of Ed's new song - until he changed his mind! (Photo: Getty Images for Fenty x Puma) Ed debuted his two new songs on Radio 1 (Photo: BBC) Read More Ed Sheeran confirms music comeback - and reveals exactly when fans can expect new tunes 
Ed’s been on hiatus from the music industry for the past year, focusing on his songwriting and life away from the spotlight. 
But he hit the headlines before Christmas when it was alleged he'd suffered a facial injury after Princess Beatrice accidentally nicked him with a sword while playfully pretending to knight James Blunt at a dinner. 
Reps for the royal and Ed declined to comment at the time. Ed joked his pal James Blunt was behind his new facial scar (Photo: Getty) https://www.instagram.com/p/9JQNm5EpEb/embed Read More Ed Sheeran reveals scar at charity gig after being SLASHED in the face by Princess Beatrice with a sword 
Ed wouldn't say on Radio 1 who was responsible for the incident but did confirm he's now got a scar. He jokingly pointed the blame at fellow popstar James, suggesting he'd made the cut to sabotage Ed! 
“I’ve been telling people it was James Blunt trying to get his pop career back,” quipped Ed. “He actually told me to say that, I’m not being mean!” 
“I love him,” he added. “We share the same management stable and same label and I’ve been able to spend a lot of time with him over the years. He’s such a nice guy. I really like him.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
